hits.comment_text: I've been writing changelogs manually for 3 years. Would pay $20/month for something that actually works and produces human-readable output.
hits.author: tired_maintainer
hits.story_title: Show HN: I built an AI changelog generator

hits.comment_text: The problem with conventional-changelog is that it just dumps commit messages. Nobody reads those. We need AI to summarize what actually changed for end users.
hits.author: product_eng
hits.story_title: Ask HN: What developer tools are missing?
